Description: Default user profile settings for Windows 11.

Set.name: TaskbarMn
Set.note: Remove the Chat icon from the Taskbar - note: this value should not be needed on Windows 11 23H2 or higher

Set.name: TaskbarDa
Set.note: Remove the Widgets icon from the Taskbar - note: this value is protected by permissions

Set.name: VisiblePlaces
Set.note: Adds 'Settings' and 'File Explorer' next to the power button on the Start menu.

Set.name: PlacesInitializedVersion
Set.note: Required to support the setting selected for VisiblePlaces.

Set.name: CopilotPWAPreinstallCompleted
Set.note: Tells Windows that the Copilot PWA has been installed

Set.name: TailoredExperiencesWithDiagnosticDataEnabled
Set.note: Disables 'Settings / Privacy & Security / Recommendations & offers / Personalised offers'

Set.name: Value
Set.note: Disables 'Settings / Privacy & Security / Recommendations & offers / Advertising ID'

Set.name: Enabled
Set.note: Disables 'Settings / Privacy & Security / Recommendations & offers / Advertising ID'

Set.name: SubscribedContent-338393Enabled
Set.note: Disables suggested content in the Settings app

Set.name: SubscribedContent-353694Enabled
Set.note: Disables suggested content in the Settings app

Set.name: SubscribedContent-353696Enabled
Set.note: Disables suggested content in the Settings app

Set.name: SubscribedContent-338388Enabled
Set.note: Disables suggested content in the Settings app

Set.name: SubscribedContent-338389Enabled
Set.note: Disables suggested content in the Settings app

SetOthers.name: TaskbarAl
SetOthers.note: Aligns the Windows 11 Start button to the left of the Taskbar

SetOthers.name: ShowTaskViewButton
SetOthers.note: Removes the Task View button on the Taskbar

SetOthers.name: Start_TrackProgs
SetOthers.note: Disables 'Settings / Privacy & Security / Recommendations & offers / Improve Start and search results'

SetOthers.name: EnableAccountNotifications
SetOthers.note: Disables 'Settings / Privacy & Security / Recommendations & offers / Show notifications in Settings'
